title: What is Cross-Validation in Machine Learning?
description: In Machine Learning, Cross-validation is a statistical method of evaluating generalization performance that is more stable and thorough than using a division of dataset into a training and test set. In this article, I’ll walk you through what cross-validation is and how to use it for machine learning using the Python programming language.
